name: Ammar Mohammed
skills_sentences: IT service management tools including ServiceNow, BMC Remedy, Jira, and ManageEngine
ITIL based incident management for priority one and two incidents
Linux system administration on Ubuntu and other distributions
Microsoft 365 services administration including Exchange Online, Teams, OneDrive, and SharePoint
PowerShell scripting for IT operations automation
VPN, Multiprotocol Label Switching, and Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line connectivity troubleshooting
Windows Server administration including Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, Group Policy, and SCCM
containerization and orchestration using Docker
database administration for Structured Query Language, MySQL, MariaDB, Apache Cassandra
desktop and endpoint deployment using Windows Deployment Services, Intune, and Acronis Cyber Protect
enterprise security controls implementation including multi-factor authentication, data loss prevention, and conditional access
firewall configuration and Secure Sockets Layer/Transport Layer Security setup
infrastructure monitoring with Nagios XI and ELK Stack
network and hardware troubleshooting certified by CompTIA Network+ and A+
network monitoring with PRTG, SolarWinds, and Zabbix
routing and switching knowledge certified by Cisco Certified Network Associate and Cisco Certified Network Professional
software support for enterprise applications including SAP, Oracle, and Microsoft Dynamics
telecommunications telematics applications management including Wialon, Nimbus, Trapeze, and Route4Me
virtualization technologies such as VMware, Hyper V, and Nutanix Acropolis Hypervisor
web server management with Apache, Nginx, and IIS
responsibility_sentences: administer Microsoft 365 services enforcing security and compliance policies
automate IT operations with PowerShell scripting reducing manual workload by 25%
conduct root cause analysis for recurring incidents implementing permanent fixes reducing high-priority tickets by 15%
configure, deploy, and maintain Windows 10/11 endpoints using Windows Deployment Services, Intune, and Acronis Cyber Protect
deliver desktop and end-user support diagnosing and resolving hardware, operating system, and application issues within service level agreements
implement enterprise-level security controls including multi-factor authentication, data loss prevention, and conditional access
manage Windows Server environments maintaining 99.9% uptime
monitor service level agreements, key performance indicators, and incident trends using ServiceNow and BMC Remedy
oversee IT operations and infrastructure for 14 fuel stations, 3 metro shops, and 3 vehicle testing centers ensuring uninterrupted operations
perform disaster recovery planning and testing meeting recovery time and point objectives with zero data loss
